section.heading: Back River.
section.text: Back River encompasses all the waters of Back River and its tributaries westerly of a line beginning at a point at or near Lat. 39° 14.95' N., Long. 76° 24.05' W., then running 173° (True) to a point at or near Lat. 39° 14.30' N., Long. 76° 23.95' W.

section.heading: Long's Creek.
section.text: Long's Creek encompasses the area beginning at a point at or near Lat. 39° 14.950' N., Long. 76° 24.260' W., then running 270° (True) to the opposite shore, at or near Lat. 39° 14.950' N., Long. 76° 24.415' W., and running to the head of the creek. This area has a 6-knot speed limit all year.

section.heading: Rocky Point.
section.text: Rocky Point encompasses the area beginning at the eastern tip of Rocky Point at or near Lat. 39° 14.955' N., Long. 76° 24.018' W., then running 175° (True) to a point, at or near Lat. 39° 14.923' N., Long. 76° 24.015' W., then running 216° (True) to a point, at or near Lat. 39° 14.897' N., Long. 76° 24.04' W., then running 267° (True) to a point, at or near Lat. 39° 14.890' N., Long. 76° 24.203' W., then running 303° (True) to a point, at or near Lat. 39° 14.950' N., Long. 76° 24.323' W., then running 90° (True) to the western tip of Rocky Point at Long's Creek , at or near Lat. 39° 14.950' N., Long. 76° 24.260' W. This area has a 6-knot speed limit all year.

annotations.annotation: Natural Resources Article, §§8-703 and 8-704, Annotated Code of Maryland
